titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I preached twice in the Abbey, & both times to very large congregations. The sermon at 7 p.m. - when Bp. Mylne preached - was also well attended. All the Americans in London must have flocked to Westminster.
